message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you a competitive price of $7,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value. I'm willing to pay $6,500 for the product.
